original: intros d0 d1 a0 a1 t Hcompat Hrec0 Hrec1. revert a1 Hrec1. induction Hrec0 using reconnaissance_ind; intros a1 Hrec1. induction Hrec1 using reconnaissance_ind. simpl in H. simpl in H0. rewrite predta_produit_2 with (a := iad_conv a a1) (s0 := ladj) (s1 := ladj0). constructor. apply predta_compatible_compat with (d0 := d0) (d1 := d1) in Hcompat. destruct (predta_produit_5 _ _ _ _ H0). destruct H1. destruct H1. destruct H1. destruct H1 as [H1 [H2 H3]]. simpl in H7. rewrite iad_inv_inv_0 in H1. injection H1 as -> ->. rewrite <- H2. rewrite <- H3. apply H7. apply Hcompat. auto. auto. qed.
